title: note.get Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description:
Retrieves a Note from a Notefile. The file must either be a DB Notefile or inbound queue file (see `file` argument below).

`.qo`/`.qos` Notes must be read from the Notehub event table using the [Notehub Event API](/api-reference/notehub-api/event-api/).

delete.description: `true` to delete the Note after retrieving it.

deleted.description: `true` to allow retrieval of a deleted Note.

file.description: The Notefile name must end in `.qi` (for plaintext transport), `.qis` (for encrypted transport), `.db` or `.dbx` (for local-only DB Notefiles).

note.description: If the Notefile has a `.db` or `.dbx` extension, specifies a unique Note ID. Not applicable to `.qi` Notefiles.

samples.description: Retrieve and delete a Note from an inbound queue file.

samples.title: Read from `.db` Notefile
samples.description: Read a specific Note from a database Notefile.

samples.title: Get Deleted Note
samples.description: Retrieve a deleted Note from a `.db` Notefile.

samples.description: Retrieve and decrypt an encrypted inbound Note.
